parameters.query:
-- Check current client's phone
SELECT id, phone
FROM elo_t_clients
WHERE id = '{{ $json.client_id }}'
  AND tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenant_id }}';

-- Find existing client with same phone in same tenant
SELECT id as existing_client_id, name, phone
FROM elo_t_clients
WHERE tenant_id = '{{ $('Validate & Normalize').first().json.tenant_id }}'
  AND phone = '{{ $('Validate & Normalize').first().json.phone }}'
  AND id != '{{ $('Validate & Normalize').first().json.client_id }}'
LIMIT 1;

-- MERGE: Move all channels from current client to existing client
-- Step 1: Update client_channels to point to existing client
UPDATE elo_t_client_channels
SET client_id = '{{ $json.existing_client_id }}'
WHERE client_id = '{{ $json.client_id }}'
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    -- Don't move if existing client already has this channel+external_id
    SELECT 1 FROM elo_t_client_channels ec
    WHERE ec.client_id = '{{ $json.existing_client_id }}'
      AND ec.channel_id = elo_t_client_channels.channel_id
      AND ec.external_id = elo_t_client_channels.external_id
  );

-- Step 2: Update dialogs to point to existing client
UPDATE elo_t_dialogs
SET client_id = '{{ $json.existing_client_id }}'
WHERE client_id = '{{ $json.client_id }}';

-- Step 3: Update messages to point to existing client
UPDATE elo_t_messages
SET client_id = '{{ $json.existing_client_id }}'
WHERE client_id = '{{ $json.client_id }}';

-- Step 4: Delete orphaned current client (no more channels)
DELETE FROM elo_t_clients
WHERE id = '{{ $json.client_id }}'
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM elo_t_client_channels
    WHERE client_id = '{{ $json.client_id }}'
  );

-- Return merged client
SELECT '{{ $json.existing_client_id }}' as result_client_id, true as was_merged;
